name: Knotless Braids – Medium
description: Tension-free knotless braids that are light, flexible and perfect for everyday wear.

name: Knotless Braids – Small
description: Small, detailed knotless braids for a sleek look that lasts several weeks.

name: Boho Knotless Braids
description: Romantic boho knotless braids with loose curls added for softness and movement.

name: Tribal Feed-in Braids
description: Centre-part tribal braids with clean parts and customised patterns.

name: Stitch Cornrows – 8 Lines
description: Sharp stitch lines created using gel and precision parting for a bold look.

name: Two-Strand Twists
description: Soft twists suitable for natural hair, easy to maintain and moisturise.

name: Passion Twists
description: Fluffy springy twists with a bohemian finish, perfect for holidays and photos.

name: Soft Locs
description: Faux locs with a soft, natural finish that mimic matured dreadlocks.

name: Faux Loc Bob
description: Chin-to-shoulder length faux locs for a chic, lightweight bob style.

name: Men's Cornrows
description: Custom cornrow patterns for men with clean parts and low tension.

name: Kids' Braids with Beads
description: Child-friendly braids with careful handling and optional beads or accessories.

name: Sew-In Weave Leave-Out
description: Classic sew-in with minimal leave-out to blend your natural hair with extensions.

name: Ponytail Cornrows
description: Cornrows that feed into a high or low ponytail with added braiding hair.

name: Scalp Treatment & Braid Takedown
description: Gentle braid removal followed by a soothing scalp cleanse and oil treatment.

name: Consultation Only
description: In-person or video consultation to assess your hair and plan the best style.
